game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Tome
game.objective: Go to a castle in the mountains, find an ancient tome, and return it to the quest giver.
game.description: You will need to be of high level to embark on this adventure. Complete it at any time after receiving it; however, the quest giver has limited patience.
game.reward: One hundred gold pieces as a reward for your efforts.
game.quest-giver: The quest giver is situated near the castle and can provide horses to aid your journey.

task.objective: .Acquire the ancient tome at the castle.
task.description: Search for the tome within the castle's library or archives.

quest-log.note: This quest is part of a larger narrative. Explore other quests for added story depth.
